titles: Thomas Law bell-man. His Christmass greeting to his masters of St. Giles Cripplegate, within the Freedom, presenteth his love and humble endeavours, as followeth.
author: Law, Thomas, bellman.
notes: Verse: "NN other Psalme this Morne I intend to sing ..."
Cf. Wing L631 which has 'Christmas' in the title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
